ygData.subject: Re: Using Trade window against KSers.
ygData.msgSnippet: It is harassment IF the person in question follows you and steals your kills. If they simply sit in one spot and kill a mob each and everytime it spawns that,
ygData.messageBody:
It is harassment IF the person in question follows you and steals your
kills. If they simply sit in one spot and kill a mob each and everytime it
spawns that, of itself, is not harassment. If they are taunting the victims
etc then it might be (probably).


-----Original Message-----
From: David Rogers <derogers334@...>
To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
Date: Tuesday, August 03, 1999 1:04 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] Using Trade window against KSers.


>From: David Rogers <derogers334@...>
>
>--- "Mr. J Daniels" <warpig@...> wrote:
>> I dont know HOW many times this needs to be said.
>> STEALING KILLS in and of itself is *NOT* bannable.
>
>You're right. Stealing *a* kill isn't banable.
>
>Stealing every kill over a 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 (etc...) hour
>period *is* bannable, because it's harassment, and
>falls under the appropriate section in the User
>Agreement that must be agreed to at each session of Everquest.
>===
>:D
> Dave's World
>-No matter where you go, there you are-

>believe it's true, or because they fear it is." Wizard's
